name: S3NotificationConfiguration
description: Describes the notification configuration for an AWS::S3::Bucket resource.

properties.name: LambdaConfigurations
properties.description: The AWS Lambda functions to invoke and the events for which to invoke the functions.
properties.typeDescription: Amazon Simple Storage Service NotificationConfiguration LambdaConfigurations

properties.name: QueueConfigurations
properties.description: The Amazon Simple Queue Service queues to publish messages to and the events for which to publish messages.
properties.typeDescription: Amazon Simple Storage Service NotificationConfiguration QueueConfigurations

properties.name: TopicConfigurations
properties.description: The topic to which notifications are sent and the events for which notification are generated.
